name: 2024 The International Conference on Optical and Photonic Engineering (icOPEN 2024)
content: Publication: icOPEN 2024 conference proceedings will be published by SPIE, which will be included in SPIE Digital Library, provided to the Web of Science Conference Proceedings Citation Index-Science, Scopus, Ei Compendex, and others, to ensure maximum awareness of the Proceedings.
organizers: Optics and Photonics Society of Singapore
